title: Why I Decided To Invest in Floppy Disks
body: You may say that investing in floppy disks in 2021 is a dumb idea. They also said that crpytocurrency was a dumb idea, and look where we're at now -- zipcoin or whatever they call it is at $500k.

title: Big Water Is Ruining the Beverage Industry
body: No one ever said drinking 12 diet cokes a day was bad for you -- I mean look! Zero sugar! But you tell your doctor you're doing that and it's 'you need more water' this and 'this will give you kidney stones' that.
